affects:
ABILITY: Unit Target
AFFECTS: Enemy Units
DAMAGE TYPE: Pure
PIERCES SPELL IMMUNITY: No
desc:
Fires an intense energy beam, dealing damage and blinding the target, causing it to miss all physical attacks.
Upgradable by Aghanim's Scepter, causing the laser to refract between all visible enemy units in a 550 range.
attrib:
BLIND MISS RATE: 100%/100%/100%/100%
HERO BLIND DURATION: 3/3.5/4/4.5
CREEP BLIND DURATION: 6/6/6/6
CAST RANGE: 550
cmb:
95/120/145/170
14
lore: Boush perfected this rock cutting laser in his subterranean laboratory, never considering its combat utility.
name: tinker_laser

affects:
ABILITY: No Target
DAMAGE TYPE: Magical
PIERCES SPELL IMMUNITY: No
desc: Launches a pair of rockets at the nearest visible enemy heroes within 2500 range. The number of missile targets is doubled with Aghanim's Scepter.
cmb:
120/140/160/180
25
lore: The last contraption Boush was able to save was a retrofitted rocket launcher with a homing mechanism.
name: tinker_heat_seeking_missile

affects:
ABILITY: Point Target
DAMAGE TYPE: Magical
PIERCES SPELL IMMUNITY: No
desc: Enlists an army of robotic minions to destroy enemy units in an area around Tinker.
notes: Robots spawn at a rate of 24 per second.
cmb:
145/150/165/190
35
lore: Even though the laboratory has since been sealed off, the ability to radio in robotic drones is still in working order.
name: tinker_march_of_the_machines

desc: CHANNELED - Resets the cooldown on most of Tinker's items and abilities.
notes: Rearm works on all items except Black King Bar, Arcane Boots, Helm of the Dominator, Hand of Midas, Refresher Orb, Linken's Sphere, and Necronomicon.
cmb:
125/225/325
0
lore: A new battery here, another set of rockets there, Boush continually improves on existing technology.
name: tinker_rearm
